name: プロデューサー
text: よーし、二次審査も通過だ！\nおめでとう、透！
trans:
Alright, the second round is a pass!
Congratulations, Toru!

name: 透
text: あ、そうなんだ\nありがと

name: プロデューサー
trans: Work hard for the next one too.

name: 透
text: ──やっぱ、あれがよかったのかな？
trans: ──You know, I think it helped me, didn't it?

name: 透
trans: The one Hinana and I came up with.

name: 透
text: 『届いてる？　トキメキ電波──\n私、みんなのこと考えるとドキドキが止まらないんだ』
trans: "Am I reaching you? With my heartrace signal──When I think about you all, the thumping in my chest just won't go away."

name: 透
text: 『ドキドキプロバイダ、浅倉透\n無限のトキメキ、定額制でお届けします』
trans:
"Dokidoki Provider, Toru Asakura.
Limitless heartrace, delivered to a fixed quota."

name: プロデューサー
text: 透、まさかそれ\n面接で言っ────！
trans: Toru, don't tell me you said that at the intervi──!

name: 透
text: ふふっ、冗談\nでも、いい言葉だよね
trans:
Fufu. Just joking.
But they're good words, aren't they.

name: 透
text: 無限のトキメキが、定額なんてさ
trans: Limitless heartrace on a fixed quota. Right?
